title: Blue Sattai Maran
text:
C.Elamaran popularly known as <a href="Blue%20Sattai%20Maran">Blue Sattai Maran</a> is an Indian movie reviewer, director, and writer. He review the movies on <a href="YouTube">YouTube</a> channel under the banner Tamil Talkies. He started his YouTube channel on 27th January 2012. He begun his reviews from <a href="Billa%20II">Billa II</a>. He debuted as an director, witter, and actor in the film <a href="Anti%20Indian">Anti Indian</a> which was released on 10th December 2021.
Filmography.
As an actor.
<a href="Anti%20Indian">Anti Indian</a> got mostly a negative reviews from the media and also from the public. 
References.
https://www.filmibeat.com/celebs/blue-sattai-maran.html
